body:
I tried to add a new version for  [fastjet](https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fastjet/package.py) but the fetcher has an issue (the fastjet release / download page is still working and unchanged, as far as I can tell: http://fastjet.fr/all-releases.html)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack checksum fastjet

==> Something failed on http://fastjet.fr/repo/fastjet-3.3.3.tar.gz, skipping.  (All fetchers failed)

```
title: Fetchers failing for fastjet
